title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 604.6 - Cooperation by applicants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 604.6 - Cooperation by applicants

State Regulations
(a) Each
applicant shall cooperate with the utility providing service in an effort to
keep the cost of construction and installation of underground telephone
distribution facilities as low as possible, consistent with requirements for
safe and adequate service, including reasonable provision for load growth and
requirements of Part 607 of this Title. (b) The utility may require that all sewers, water facilities, drainage facilities, and curbs be installed before it
commences construction within a residential subdivision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
604.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
